verses.name: 2 Kings 17:8
verses.text: And walked in the statutes of the heathen, whom the Lord cast out from before the children of Israel, and of the kings of Israel, which they had made.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:9
verses.text: And the children of Israel did secretly those things that were not right against the Lord their God, and they built them high places in all their cities, from the tower of the watchmen to the fenced city.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:10
verses.text: And they set them up images and groves in every high hill, and under every green tree:
